text:
What else can i say except that i LOVE this place?? Rod and his mum are always so welcoming and so lovely. I had so much fun making my own terrarium under Rod's guidance that i came back to make another moss scape..  this time with more help.

Your work and your genuineness in service never fails to make me smile.

Green Fingers Aquarist is a total gem! Rodrigo, the owner, is super friendly, crazy helpful, and knows everything about fishes and plants. The aquascaping here is next-level—seriously stunning stuff. If you’re into aquariums or terrariums, this is the spot. Highly recommend checking it out!

Rod is so patient and helpful in helping me build a scape for my air plants! He gave great advice on the different kinds of rocks and pebbles I can play with and it was tough choosing from the variety that he has!

My favourite aquarium shop in Singapore!
The owner, Rod is friendly, knows a lot about plants, fish, has a lot of passion in the trade and very patient in explaining all details about the varieties of his plants and fishes.

Last but not least, the pricing in the shop is also budget friendly.

Walking into the iconic hawker center on the 1st storey of Chinatown Complex into the adjoining staircase, the greenery plants overshadow the shop at the end of the corridor. The shop may be small but nothing can escape the varieties of plants, fishes, aquariums and terrarium glass containers. The aqua and terrarium accessories are captivating and creative. The owner is so soft spoken, kind, helpful and patient. Do pay a visit and you will not be disappointed!
